name: 40Love.ai
slogan: Tennis video analysis to help you improve, all from your smartphone
description: We're solving hard problems in computer vision and AI.

team.title: CTO
team.name: Ilmars Poikans
team.bioHtml: Lead engineer at Parakweet (Bookvibe, InboxVudu); Lead engineer at Chintano; Researcher at AI Lab (University of Latvia); Co-founder of One.lv, MS in CS

team.title: CEO
team.name: Filip Ljubicic
team.bioHtml: Experienced PM. Built products in education, retail and sport. Product guy, former rower. UCL grad.

team.name: Ramesh Haridas
team.bioHtml: Started and sold 3 companies. My last company was an AI powered email assistant that was acquired by Google. Early investor in AVG, @Ripple, @Refinery29.

jobs.title: iOS dev
jobs.description:
Responsibilities
- Design and build applications for the iOS platform
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
- Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
- Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
- Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization

Skills
- Proficient with Swift and Cocoa Touch
- Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, ARKit, Core ML etc.
- Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
- Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards
- Understanding of Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines
- Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred
- Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
- Knack for benchmarking and optimization
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git.
- Familiarity with continuous integration

Your Experience
At least 5 years experience developing iOS applications
Computer Science Degree a good to have
A portfolio of apps that you have developed or worked on
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Responsibilities

  • Design and build applications for the iOS platform
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
  • Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
  • Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization

Skills

  • Proficient with Swift and Cocoa Touch
  • Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, ARKit, Core ML etc.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
  • Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards
  • Understanding of Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines
  • Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • Knack for benchmarking and optimization
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git.
  • Familiarity with continuous integration

Your Experience

Computer Science Degree a good to have
A portfolio of apps that you have developed or worked on
